PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of KEN SANDHU, Deputy Chairperson and Member, Refugee Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, effective June 13, 2013 until such time as a Chairperson is designated.
